Waibu Web Framework

## Applications

- [Multi Page Application - waibu-mpa](https://ardhi.github.io/waibu-mpa)
- [REST Api Framework - waibu-rest-api](https://ardhi.github.io/waibu-rest-api)
- [Static Resource - waibu-static](https://ardhi.github.io/waibu-static)
